predicate.note: Frames file for 'reconsider' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Not comparable to 'consider'.

roleset.name: think about again

example.name: almost always infinitival
example.text: ``Perhaps if my personal matters can be resolved with Laurel bank in the near future, I may be inclined *trace* to reconsider your request...''

example.name: with grounds
example.text: Britain and all of Europe need *trace* to reconsider the prospects for European integration in light of the possible reunification and neutralization of Germany.
example.arg: in light of the possible reunification and neutralization of Germany

roleset.note: This is not a remapping from 'consider', because 'reconsider' cannot take a secondary predicate: John is considered an idiot, but not John is reconsidered an idiot.
